name: DEFENSIVE TURRETS
description:
DEFENSIVE TURRETS my second game, you have to fight the robots with all your ammo bullets and laser for a full nine levels to reach the BOSS in the tenth level, your main goal is not letting any enemy get into your barracks to get closer to the final boss level.

Today I'm putting my work for a full eight months out to the world
I used a lot of knowledge from a lot of places, tutorials, courses and lots of patients to make everything work as I want.

I hope you like it.
